# All rights reserved.
#
# September 2015,     R.A. Winters <riwinter@cisco.com>

# XxX.... or
# Xx<desc>X....
#
# desc is the string to label the match in the table
# x is literal and x is one of:
#
# A - address (ipv4 or ipv6)
# I - interface name
# F - floating point number
# H - hex number
# M - mac address
# N - number
# R - newline requires
# P - prefix address (ipv4 or ipv6)
# p - parenthesis - match value inside parens
# S - non-space
# T - time (00:0:00)
# W - word
#
# or XXX<regex>XXX... or
# or XXX<regex><desc>XXX...
#
# regex is a regular expression
# desc is the string to label the match in the table

OS: IOS

CMD: SHOW_STANDBY_REDIRECT
SHOWCMD: show standby redirect
PREFIX: standby-redirect

ACTUAL:

#show standby redirect
Interface    Redirects Unknown   Adv      Holddown
Te0/1/0.2500 enabled   enabled   30       180

Active                Hits  Interface Group Virtual IP            Virtual MAC
local                 0     Te0/1/0.2500
                                      1064  10.100.0.33           0000.0c9f.f428


MARKUP:

#show standby redirect
Interface    Redirects Unknown   Adv      Holddown
XI<intf>XTe0/1/0.2500 XW<redirect>Xenabled   XW<unknown>Xenabled   XN<adv>X30       XN<holddown>X180

Active                Hits  Interface Group Virtual IP            Virtual MAC
XS<addr>Xlocal                 XN<hits>X0     XI<active-intf>XTe0/1/0.2500
                                      XN<group>X1064  XA<vaddr>X10.100.0.33           XM<vmac>X0000.0c9f.f428
